name: Ceo - A bunny in the pocket omniverse
name_original: Ceo - A bunny in the pocket omniverse
description:
First time doing a game jam and learning how to use unity.

In comes Ceo, an orange bun living in their little island world!
They hope to one day explore the far reaches of the omniverse and find a multitude of strange worlds...

...But for now they're confined to their small home.

Done by:
http://twitter.com/Ropnolc (art, models, coding, music)
http://twitter.com/Badmilkchef (models, music, coding)
